content: **errata** *row 5-6 should be repeated an additional **16 times** not 17 to reach 38 double_crochet clusters the pdf has been updated with this correction * **there s now a video tutorial 1 for this pattern on my youtube channel ** a bandana cowl with a tassel in front… a hood with a tassel in back… you decide **finished measurements** circumference 27 inches long depth excluding tassel 27 inches short depth 13 5 inches **materials** universal yarns wisdom yarn poems sock 75% wool 25% nylon 459yds/420m per 100g skein 1 skein in color #955 g/6 or 4 25mm hook stitch marker tapestry needle **gauge** 14 double_crochet by 8 row = 4 inches by 4 inches after blocking **abbreviations** chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet st s = stitch es yo = yarn over if you re having trouble with any of my patterns or simply want to show off your project please feel free to visit my ravelry group carissa browning designs 2 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=rbel5ajzpbq 2 https //www ravelry com/groups/carissa-browning-designs
